Balance of manufacturer 5 year/200 000km   warranty, 2 year/30 000km service plan, 6 year corrosion warranty and 3 year roadside assist.
The S-Presso brings alive every place in the city it ventures to with a bold design, robust stance that radiates vibrant energy, its attractive SUV styling and 180mm ground clearance. Every drive in this city slicking or dirt road travelling SUV, is a self-expression of the zesty spirit that defines you. Give us a call to book your test drive. Images are for illustration purposes only.

attributes.description: Action Ford Modimolle is a proud member of CFAO Motors South Africa. Our network re-present us across the country with the opportunity to leave our footprint in various brands. We pride ourselves to the top level of quality service that is well known within Ford SA's extremely high standards in our range of New and Approved Pre - Owned vehicles. Our well trained Team of Sales Executive's eagerly await your request to assist and find the right vehicle to fit your personal needs, with our expert onsite Business Manager that will structure the best possible deal to suit your financial needs. Our top notch Technical Team and Parts department will cater for your every need and assist with friendly service in our ongoing effort to treat you, our best asset, with care and professionalism, to ensure our service levels meet with your high demand! We think this to be a good time for you to contact us!

attributes.description:
When you move smart, you live smart, and the Celerio gives you the ability to do both. With all-new technologies, unmatched space, and safety features that outsmart the rest, the Celerio is a partner for a smart, satisfying driving experience.
Celerio 1.0 GL Auto Features:
Remote central locking with alarm system.
Front and rear electric windows.
Electric mirrors.
Factory infotainment system with Bluetooth.
Rear park assist.
Alloy wheels.
Air conditioner.
Driver and passenger airbags
Anti Lock Brake System with EBD.
Automatic gearbox

attributes.description:
The Jimny can climb over most obstacles and steep hills without scraping its bumpers or underbody, thanks to an ample approach angle, ramp breakover angle, departure angle, as well as plenty of ground clearance. From the very first generation, the Jimny has always featured a rigid ladder frame chassis that offers a solid foundation for serious off-road performance. The new Jimny comes with a range of protective advances to keep you safe out in the wild or in the city.

Jimny 1.5 GL AllGrip Features:
Remote central locking with alarm system.
Front electric windows and electric mirrors.
Factory infotainment system with Bluetooth.
Multi function steering wheel.
Driver and passenger airbags.
Full Selective 4x4 with low range.
Hill Descent Control.
Air conditioner.
15 Inch Alloy Wheels with High Profile Tyres
